spellcrafting.spellbook.description:
Check your saved spell segments here.
Your spellbook comes with some pre-made spell segments!
spellcrafting.help.description: Get an explanation of the interface
spellcrafting.icon.description: The icon for this spell in your spellbook.
spellcrafting.manifestation-modifier.des: A modifier value for the manifestation type.
spellcrafting.attribute-strength.descrip: How strong the attributes of the spell will be.
spellcrafting.chain-delay.description: How long to delay after the triggering condition before this part of the chain is activated.
